page.title: 02EASTGATE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: { {EASTGATE SHOPPING CENTRE IS BUILT OF BRICKS FACED WITH TARRADALE STONE. INSIDE THERE ARE SHOPS ON EITHER SIDE OF A BROAD MALL, WHICH HAS ACURVED GLASS FOOF REFLECTING 50% OF THE SUN'S RAYS. ALSO THERE ARE ESCALATORS, LIFTS, A CAR PARK AND A RAISED WALKWAY. THERE ARE ALL TYPES OF SHOPS SUCH AS THOSE SELLING FOOD, CLOTHES AND TOYS. THE MOST POPULAR STORE WITH SHOPPERS IS MARKS AND SPENCERS ACCORDING TO ONE MIDDLE AGED WOMAN WHOM WE INTERVIEWED.THE GOOD FRESH FOOD ATTRACTS PEOPLE TO THIS STORE. THE CENTRE IS RUN BY THE MANAGER, HIS SECRETARY, SECURITY TEAM, CAR PARK ATTENDANTS AND CLEANERS. THE BIG CLOCK IN THE CENTRE IS IN THE SHAPE OF NOAH'S ARK. EASTGATE SHOPPING CENTRE IS POPULAR WITH TOURISTS AND LOCALS.
